kv18.4:1.1: Buddhassa bhagavato uccārapassāvo ativiya aññe gandhajāte adhiggaṇhātīti?
kv18.4:1.7: Hañci bhagavā odanakummāsaṁ bhuñjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.4:1.8: “buddhassa bhagavato uccārapassāvo ativiya aññe gandhajāte adhiggaṇhātī”ti.
kv18.4:2.1: Buddhassa bhagavato uccārapassāvo ativiya aññe gandhajāte adhiggaṇhātīti?
kv18.4:2.3: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato uccārapassāvaṁ nhāyanti vilimpanti ucchādenti peḷāya paṭisāmenti karaṇḍāya nikkhipanti āpaṇe pasārenti, tena ca gandhena gandhakaraṇīyaṁ karontīti?
